activities.name: Arrival in Kathgodam and transfer to Nainital (approx. 2 hours)
activities.description: Arrive at Kathgodam railway station. Hire a taxi to Nainital. Check into your hotel.

activities.name: Naini Lake Boat Ride
activities.description: Enjoy a romantic boat ride on the serene Naini Lake.

activities.name: Naina Devi Temple
activities.description: Visit the Naina Devi Temple located on the edge of Naini Lake. (Optional)

activities.name: Mall Road Stroll
activities.description: Evening stroll on the bustling Mall Road, shopping for souvenirs.

food.name: Machan Restaurant
food.description: Enjoy dinner with a view of the lake. Vegetarian and non-vegetarian options are available.

accommodation.name: Vikram Vintage Inn
accommodation.description: A charming hotel with beautiful views and comfortable rooms.

activities.name: Tiffin Top (Dorothy's Seat)
activities.description: Hike or horse ride to Tiffin Top for panoramic views of Nainital and the surrounding hills.

activities.name: Snow View Point
activities.description: Take a cable car to Snow View Point for breathtaking views of the Himalayan peaks.

activities.name: Nainital Zoo
activities.description: Visit the high altitude zoo to see Himalayan wildlife.

food.name: Zooby's Kitchen
food.description: Enjoy lunch at this popular cafe.

food.name: Sakley's Restaurant & Pastry Shop
food.description: Dine at Sakley's for a romantic dinner.

accommodation.name: Vikram Vintage Inn
accommodation.description: Continue your stay at Vikram Vintage Inn.

activities.name: Transfer to Kausani (approx. 5-6 hours)
activities.description: Hire a taxi from Nainital to Kausani.

activities.name: Check into Hotel and Relax
activities.description: Check into your hotel and enjoy the scenic beauty.

activities.name: Sunset View at View Point
activities.description: Enjoy a romantic sunset view over the Himalayan peaks from a viewpoint in Kausani.

food.name: Garden Restaurant at Kausani Best Inn
food.description: Enjoy a delicious dinner with local flavors. Vegetarian options available.

activities.name: Anasakti Ashram
activities.description: Visit the Anasakti Ashram where Mahatma Gandhi stayed for some time.

activities.name: Rudradhari Falls and Caves
activities.description: Trek to Rudradhari Falls and explore the caves. (Moderate trek)

activities.name: Tea Garden Visit
activities.description: Visit the Kausani Tea Estate and enjoy a tea tasting session.

food.name: Restaurant at your hotel
food.description: Enjoy a relaxing dinner at your hotel.

activities.name: Transfer to Mukteshwar (approx. 4-5 hours)
activities.description: Hire a taxi from Kausani to Mukteshwar.

activities.name: Check into Hotel and Relax
activities.description: Check into your hotel and enjoy the serene atmosphere.

activities.name: Mukteshwar Temple
activities.description: Visit the Mukteshwar Temple dedicated to Lord Shiva. Enjoy panoramic views from here.

food.name: Chirping Tales Cafe
food.description: Enjoy lunch at this scenic cafe.

accommodation.name: The Swiss Village
accommodation.description: A charming resort with breathtaking views and comfortable stay.

activities.name: Chauli ki Jali
activities.description: Visit Chauli ki Jali, a cliff famous for rock climbing and rappelling (optional adventure activity).

activities.name: Bhalu Gaad Waterfalls
activities.description: Hike to Bhalu Gaad Waterfalls for a refreshing experience. (Moderate trek)

activities.name: Sunset at viewpoint
activities.description: Enjoy a romantic sunset view.

food.name: Nathukhan Market
food.description: Explore the local market and enjoy street food.

food.name: Dining at The Swiss Village
food.description: Enjoy a romantic dinner at your resort.

accommodation.name: The Swiss Village
accommodation.description: Continue your stay at The Swiss Village.

activities.name: Transfer to Kathgodam (approx. 3-4 hours)
activities.description: Hire a taxi from Mukteshwar to Kathgodam railway station for your departure.

weather_suggestion: The weather in Uttarakhand in May is generally pleasant. Expect sunny days, but pack light woolens for evenings as the temperature may drop. Consider carrying rain gear as occasional showers are possible, especially in the hills. It's best to check the specific forecast closer to your travel dates.
budget_considerations: This itinerary is designed to be within your budget of INR 100,000. Accommodation is estimated at INR 3000-5000 per night. Travel between locations is estimated at INR 2000-3000 per day. Food expenses can be adjusted based on your dining preferences. Activities are generally budget-friendly.
local_events: There are no major festivals typically during this time. However, local temple fairs might be happening. Inquire locally upon arrival.
